Text: Grrr... you RKSTR are amazing! I cant believe that people can be so ignorant and rude. Please dont let a few bad eggs ruin it :( THANK YOU SO SO SO MUCH FOR ALL THAT YOU DO!

And to all the impatient people bothering you: shut the fuck up, you ungrateful bitches.

RKSTR ignore the ASSHOLES!  If I look for it and it's not there I try again later.  Really appreciate you uploading at all, and anyone who gives you a hard time isn't even worth your words...
thanks for doing these mate - really appreciated

To all the whinging little assholes (and yeah, we know you're reading this):

Shut your mouth - open your wallet - and pay for the service needed to watch the show live. If you can't (or won't) do that, then shut the fuck up and simply wait like EVERYONE ELSE! RKSTR is the only guy doing this well, and he's only still doing it because so many people begged him to. You want to make demands? Want to see the uploaded show before anyone else?! Then pay the man!! He's doing this for FREE dumb arses. Think about that before you have a go at him for not doing it fast enough!! 

Seriously said, your life, we don't give a fuck.

rkstr - Thanks!

people who take the time to thank rkstr every week - Thanks!

Everyone else - THINK before you comment or ask a question here or elsewhere, it may be that a simple please and thank you or profession of your ignorance to how this all works is enough to get you the answer/explanation you want/need without making someone who takes time out of their life to upload all of this stuff feel used.
Remember - we're all using our bandwidth to share this stuff, and the uploaders often times have to pay for the show/movie/music in the first place too! They are sharing a gift with us, so all hail the uploaders! It's a community yo! Be nice to thy neighbours!

OTT? probably, sorry guys. I just really love getting my TV fix - if it weren't for people like rkstr I'd have to get a life :P
